title: Boxty with liver and bacon
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) potatoes, peeled', '110g (4 oz) self raising flour', '85ml (3 fl oz) milk', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '25g (1 oz) butter', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '25g (1 oz) plain flour', '1 teaspoon dried mixed herbs', "225g (8 oz) lamb's liver, cut into thin strips", '8 rashers bacon', '170g (6 oz) shredded cabbage']
